The R package `palasso` implements the paired lasso.

```{r,eval=FALSE}
library(devtools)
install_github("rauschenberger/palasso")
# install.packages("palasso")
```

```{r}
library(palasso)
```

```{r}
attach(toydata)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
names <- names(toydata)
for(i in 1:length(names)){
    assign(names[i],toydata[[i]])
}
rm(names)
```

```{r}
#library(glmnet)
#net <- glmnet(y=y,x=X[[1]])
```

```{r}
object <- palasso(y=y,X=X)
```

similar methods (to glmnet and stats)

```{r}
object
```

```{r,results='hide'}
weights(object)
```

```{r,results='hide'}
fitted(object)
```

```{r,results='hide'}
residuals(object)
```

```{r,results='hide'}
predict(object,newdata=X)
```
